response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value for both of us. Given its worth to you and its intrinsic qualities, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring you receive a product that meets your needs while allowing me to recoup more than its cost to me. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
